item.name: Device Management (Admin)

request.description: List all students with their registered devices. Admin only.
Get detailed device information for a specific student. Admin only.
Update the maximum number of allowed devices for a student (1-10). Admin only.
Remove a specific device from a student, forcing logout on that device. Admin only.
Remove all devices from a student, forcing them to login again. Admin only.

Create a new category with form-data (for image upload). To upload an image: 1. Ensure body type is 'formdata' 2. Set 'image' field type to 'File' 3. Click file picker and select your image 4. Send request
